title: Dude, where's my charger
description: An app where the user can swiftly find an electric charger station within a specified distance. This application uses two api keys for location.

title: Employee Manager
description: An app that allows a user to quickly update employee data in a database.

title: Page Turner
description: A online book club for book enthusiasts who can post their opinions on books. This app uses Google book as an api.

title: Team Generator
description: This is a terminal prompted app which generates a HTML document thru prompts.
tech: Javascript, Node Js, Inquirer, HTML/CSS with Bootstrap

title: E- Commerce Backend
description: This app is the backend of an ecommerce app, where the routes were created and using Express, mySQL, and Insomnia were required.

title: Employee Directory
description: This app allows a business owner or manager to quickly view and sort 200 empoloyees by name.
